title: Frozen Hazelnut Vanilla Cream
directions: In a blender, grind the fine hazelnuts, add Frangelico, cognac, ice cream and 1 cup cracked ice.
Blend the mixture, scraping down the sides occasionally, until it is smooth but still frozen. Divide the mixture between 2 stemmed glasses.
ingredients: 1/4 cup hazelnuts, toasted lightly, rubbed in a dish towel to remove some of the skins, and cooled
1 cup vanilla ice cream, softened slightly
